attributes.action: Reverse the process so that proposals to allow homosexual rights to over-rule the rights of those who choose to hold to a particular faith do NOT become law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Parliamentary Report into SORs show specifically that should the issues raised therein become law, then Muslims, Jews, Christians will become specific targets who will need to decide whether to follow their faith or be dragged through the courts, like common criminals.
Where is freedom of speech? Why is it maintained that the minority can inflict their beliefs & way of life on the majority, yet the majority will be criminalised for choosing not to follow the minority?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
